verses.verse: And when the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> concerning the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> him with <S%H2420>hard<s%> <S%H2420>questions.<s%>

And she <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2428>train,<s%> with <S%H1581>camels<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones:<s%> and when she was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> she <S%H1696>communed<s%> with him of <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in her <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1697>questions:<s%> there was not any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5046>told<s%> her not.
And when the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built,<s%>

And the <S%H3978>meat<s%> of his <S%H7979>table,<s%> and the <S%H4186>sitting<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H4612>attendance<s%> of his <S%H8334>ministers,<s%> and their <S%H4403>apparel,<s%> and his <S%H4945>cupbearers,<s%> and his <S%H5930>ascent<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in her.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> It was a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H1697>report<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> in my own <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1697>acts<s%> and of your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

However, I <S%H539>believed<s%> not the <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>came,<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> it: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> was not <S%H5046>told<s%> me: your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H3254>exceeds<s%> the <S%H8052>fame<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are your <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> which <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and that <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in you, to <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> therefore <S%H7760>made<s%> he you <S%H4428>king,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice.<s%>

And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and of <S%H1314>spices<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> store, and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones:<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1931>such<s%> <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%> as <S%H1931>these<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

And the <S%H590>navy<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H2438>Hiram,<s%> that <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in from <S%H211>Ophir<s%> <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>plenty<s%> of <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H4552>pillars<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3658>harps<s%> also and <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> for <S%H7891>singers:<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3651>such<s%> <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H2656>desire,<s%> <S%H834>whatever<s%> she <S%H7592>asked,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her of his <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H3027>bounty.<s%> So she <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to her own <S%H776>country,<s%> she and her <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Now the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> three <S%H8346>score<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%>

<S%H905>Beside<s%> that he had of the <S%H8446>merchants,<s%> and of the <S%H4536>traffic<s%> of the <S%H7402>spice<s%> <S%H7402>merchants,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia,<s%> and of the <S%H6346>governors<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6793>targets<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6793>target.<s%>

And he made <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4488>pound<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4043>shield:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with the <S%H6338>best<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

The <S%H3678>throne<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps,<s%> and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was <S%H5696>round<s%> <S%H310>behind:<s%> and there were <S%H3027>stays<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> either side on the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7675>seat,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3027>stays.<s%>

And <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> side and on the <S%H2088>other<s%> on the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps:<s%> there was not the <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4945>drinking<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> were of <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> were of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> it was <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> <S%H2803>accounted<s%> of in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> had at <S%H3220>sea<s%> a <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H8659>Tharshish<s%> with the <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H2438>Hiram:<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H8659>Tharshish,<s%> <S%H5375>bringing<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8143>ivory,<s%> and <S%H6971>apes,<s%> and <S%H8500>peacocks.<s%>
So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1431>exceeded<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6239>riches<s%> and for <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4503>present,<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8008>garments,<s%> and <S%H5402>armor,<s%> and <S%H1314>spices,<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H6505>mules,<s%> a <S%H1697>rate<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and he had a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> whom he <S%H3240>bestowed<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> to be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H730>cedars<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> he to be as the <S%H8256>sycomore<s%> trees that are in the <S%H8219>vale,<s%> for <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H4161>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4723>linen<s%> <S%H4723>yarn:<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> the <S%H4723>linen<s%> <S%H4723>yarn<s%> at a <S%H4242>price.<s%>

And a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H3318>went<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and an <S%H5483>horse<s%> for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty:<s%> and so for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and for the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> did they <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out by their <S%H3027>means.<s%>
